description: Learn how to cook the juiciest roast pork and crunchiest crackling with this easy recipe. Paired with golden roast potatoes, it's the perfect family dinner.
keywords: Roast Pork With Smashed Garlic Roast Potatoes & Gravy
name: Roast Pork With Smashed Garlic Roast Potatoes & Gravy Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 kg Woolworths boneless roast pork leg
1 kg Woolworths Simply Steam baby white potatoes
270 g Woolworths creamy & crunchy salad kit
0.25 cup Woolworths roast meat flavoured instant gravy

recipeInstructions.text: Place gravy powder in a heatproof jug. Gradually whisk in 200ml boiling water and any resting juices from pork until smooth and combined. Serve sliced pork with potatoes, salad and gravy.
